parameters.name: Collection
parameters.description:
Collection name.

> You can use the [ListCollections](~~2401503~~) API to view the list.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
Instance ID.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) API to view details of all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances in the target region, including the instance ID.

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: Filter condition for the data to be updated, in SQL WHERE format. This field cannot be empty at the same time as the Ids field.

parameters.name: Ids
parameters.description: ID list of the data to be updated, i.e., the Row.Id specified when uploading the data. This field cannot be empty at the same time as the Filter field.

parameters.name: Metadata
parameters.description: Data to be updated, in a JSON string of MAP format. The key is the field name, and the value is the new data value.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description:
Namespace.

> You can use the [ListNamespaces](~~2401502~~) API to view the list.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: Region ID where the instance is located.

parameters.name: WorkspaceId
parameters.description: ID of the Workspace composed of multiple database instances. This parameter and the DBInstanceId parameter cannot both be empty. When both are specified, this parameter takes precedence.
